member.name: T:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1
member.summary: Manages the and events found in the interface.
member.typeparam: Type the object is tracking notifications for.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.StateChanges
member.summary: Gets list of each time the object's IsChanged state has changed.

member.name: P:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.WasChangedCount
member.summary: Gets number of times the was raised with a true value.

member.name: P:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.IsChangedPropertyCount
member.summary: Gets number of times the was raised with the IsChanged property.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.AssertWasChanged
member.summary: Tests that regardless of the number of changes made, the test object only raised and changed the IsChanged property once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.ClearNotifications
member.summary: Clears the current lists of notifications.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssertTracker`1.Reset
member.summary: Resets the changes on the object and clears the current lists of notifications.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets object which is being tracked and evaluated.

member.summary: Gets list of the properties that have raised notification for the tracked object.

member.summary: Gets number of properties that have changed since the last reset.

member.summary: Evaluates that the names property has been raised any number of times.

member.summary: Clears all of the current notifications for the tracked object.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyNotificationAssertTracker`1.Reset
member.summary: Resets all of the testing parameters for the tracked object.
